thread.title: Teacher resigns from Holy Cross after misconduct allegations
thread.title_full: Teacher resigns from Holy Cross after misconduct allegations - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Teacher resigns from Holy Cross after misconduct allegations
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - A Holy Cross teacher is no longer employed at the school after allegations of misconduct with a student more than 25 years ago.
Sue Ellen Lyons had been working at the school since 1978. She gained notoriety as the first female wrestling coach in Louisiana.
Lyons resigned, according to a school spokesperson.
Holy Cross is an all-boys Catholic school in Gentilly. The school moved from Chalmette after Hurricane Katrina.
